name: Elshard - The Lost Isle
description:
Uncover the mystery in the lost isle of Elshard! Overcome the challenges and solve the puzzles in this 3D immersive platformer game.

Features:

  • Exploration elements which guide player to find clues or even finding hidden rewards.
  • All choices matter. Would you rather consume a herb right away? or save it for later when you are dying? Just remember, it always comes with consequences.
  • Risk vs Rewards. Hidden paths are often rewarding but always be cautious with the obstacles.

Elshard - The Lost Isle is a solo student project, developed by Roland Lilakarsa.
